description: Three boys from Love`s school go on a triple date with the girls. Wester makes a panda cart become a Nakewameke and causes chaos, that is unless the girls stop him.

titles.title: My Heart`s Racing at the Amusement Park! Those Trembling Dating Feelings!?
Yuuenchi de Dokidoki! Wakuwaku Date Kibun!?
遊園地でドキドキ! ワクワクデート気分!?
